statements: SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets LIMIT 5
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, issue_description FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE status = 'open'
SELECT customer_name, issue_description, created_at FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE ticket_id = 3
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT customer_name, status FROM customer_support_tickets ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, issue_description FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE status = 'Resolved' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE issue_description LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets, status FROM customer_support_tickets GROUP BY status ORDER BY total_tickets DESC;
SELECT * FROM support_tickets;
SELECT customer_name, issue_description FROM support_tickets WHERE status = 'open';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name FROM support_tickets ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT agent_name, department FROM support_agents WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE issue_description LIKE '%network%' ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE status='Open' ORDER BY ticket_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_name, issue_description FROM support_tickets WHERE status='Closed' ORDER BY ticket_id ASC
SELECT agent_name, department FROM support_agents WHERE department='Technical Support' ORDER BY agent_name
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name FROM support_tickets WHERE status='Open' AND customer_name='John Doe'
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE issue_description LIKE '%urgent%'
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, status FROM tickets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT ticket_id, description FROM tickets WHERE status='Open';
SELECT action_id, action_type, action_date FROM ticket_actions ORDER BY action_date ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id, status FROM tickets WHERE status='Open' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT ticket_id, description FROM tickets WHERE ticket_id IN (SELECT ticket_id FROM ticket_actions WHERE action_type='Resolved');
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets FROM tickets GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(ticket_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM ticket_actions WHERE action_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM support_tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, status FROM support_tickets WHERE status='Open';
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_id=1001;
SELECT ticket_id, comment, comment_date FROM ticket_comments WHERE ticket_id=2001 ORDER BY comment_date DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, attachment_name, attachment_type FROM ticket_attachments WHERE attachment_type='image' ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE status = 'open';
SELECT customer_name, issue_description FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM ticket_comments JOIN support_tickets ON ticket_comments.ticket_id = support_tickets.ticket_id WHERE support_tickets.customer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT ticket_id, status_changed_to, changed_by, change_date FROM ticket_history ORDER BY change_date DESC;

SELECT support_tickets.ticket_id, support_tickets.customer_name, COUNT(ticket_comments.comment) AS num_comments FROM support_tickets LEFT JOIN ticket_comments ON support_tickets.ticket_id = ticket_comments.ticket_id GROUP BY support_tickets.ticket_id HAVING num_comments > 0;
SELECT ticket_id, create_date, status FROM tickets;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT agent_id, full_name, department FROM support_agents;
SELECT note_id, note_date, note FROM ticket_notes;
SELECT history_id, update_date, status FROM ticket_history;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE status='open';
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, create_date FROM tickets WHERE status='resolved';
SELECT t.full_name, c.email, t.issue_description FROM customers c JOIN tickets t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE t.status='open';
SELECT th.ticket_id, th.status, th.update_date, tn.note FROM ticket_history th LEFT JOIN ticket_notes tn ON th.ticket_id = tn.ticket_id WHERE th.status='escalated';
SELECT tn.ticket_id, ta.full_name AS agent_name, tn.note, tn.note_date FROM ticket_notes tn JOIN support_agents ta ON tn.agent_id = ta.agent_id WHERE tn.note_date > '2022-01-01';
